sys_script_include.name: JobUtilsProgressReport

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_c3ab44522f6f951003377f572799b6b9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_156954_sch_util.JobUtilsProgressReport</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>JobUtilsProgressReport</name><script><![CDATA[var JobUtilsProgressReport = Class.create();
JobUtilsProgressReport.prototype = {
    initialize: function () {
        this.contexts = [];
    },

    addNewContext: function () {
        this.contexts.push(new this.Context());
        return this.contexts[this.contexts.length - 1];
    },


    Context: function () {
        this.inProgress = false;
        this.status = '';
        this.percentage = '';
        this.age = {
            display: '',
            type: ''
        };
        this.startTime = '';
        this.endTime = '';


        this.setJobInProgress = function (inProgress, status) {
            this.inProgress = inProgress || false;
            this.status = status;
        }

        this.setPercent = function (percent) {
            this.percentage = percent;
        }

        this.setStartTime = function (gdt) {
            if (!gdt) {
                return;
            }
            
            this.startTime = gdt.getDisplayValue();
            if (new GlideDateTime() > gdt) {
                this.age.display = GlideDateTime.subtract(gdt, new GlideDateTime()).getDisplayValue();
                this.age.type = 'past';
            } else {
                this.age.display = GlideDateTime.subtract(new GlideDateTime(), gdt).getDisplayValue();
                this.age.type = 'future';
            }
        }

        this.setEndTime = function(gdt) {
            if (!gdt) {
                return;
            }
            this.endTime = gdt.getDisplayValue();
        }
    },

    type: 'JobUtilsProgressReport'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-05 16:12:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>c3ab44522f6f951003377f572799b6b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JobUtilsProgressReport</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Scheduled Job Utilities" source="x_156954_sch_util">14ed2eeb2f75d110a8ce2b5df699b6c7</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Scheduled Job Utilities">14ed2eeb2f75d110a8ce2b5df699b6c7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c3ab44522f6f951003377f572799b6b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-06 14:29:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
